com.here.android.positioning

Class StatusListenerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.positioning.StatusListenerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatusListener

    public class StatusListenerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatusListener
    Convenience adapter class for HERE positioning status listener interface. This class has empty default implementation for each status callback, which can be selectively overridden in actual listener implementation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.here.android.positioning.StatusListener

        StatusListener.PositioningError, StatusListener.ServiceError

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAirplaneModeEnabled()
      Device is set to airplane mode, preventing network usage and possibly Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and cellular scans.
      void onBluetoothDisabled()
      Bluetooth is disabled in the device, preventing Bluetooth positioning.
      void onCellDisabled()
      Phone radios are disabled, preventing outdoor cellular tower positioning.
      void onGnssLocationDisabled()
      GNSS location provider is disabled, preventing outdoor and indoor gnss positioning.
      void onNetworkLocationDisabled()
      Network location provider is disabled, preventing outdoor and indoor based network positioning.
      void onOfflineModeChanged(boolean offline)
      HERE SDK is set to run in offline mode, preventing online requests and on-demand radio map downloads.
      void onPositioningError(StatusListener.PositioningError error)
      Positioning failure.
      void onServiceError(StatusListener.ServiceError error)
      Service initialization failed.
      void onWifiIndoorPositioningDegraded()
      Indoor WiFi positioning update rate is degraded.
      void onWifiIndoorPositioningNotAvailable()
      Indoor WiFi positioning is not available.
      void onWifiScansDisabled()
      Wi-Fi scans are disabled in the device, preventing outdoor and indoor Wi-Fi positioning.

    • Method Detail

      • onOfflineModeChanged

        public void onOfflineModeChanged(boolean offline)
        Description copied from interface: StatusListener
        HERE SDK is set to run in offline mode, preventing online requests and on-demand radio map downloads. Positioning is possible only for those areas that are already covered by the cache or previously downloaded radio maps.
        Specified by:
        onOfflineModeChanged in interface StatusListener
        Parameters:
        offline - If true offlne mode is enabled, if false offline mode is disabled.

      • onAirplaneModeEnabled

        public void onAirplaneModeEnabled()

        Specified by:
        onAirplaneModeEnabled in interface StatusListener

        Description copied from interface: StatusListener

        Specified by:

      • onWifiIndoorPositioningNotAvailable

        public void onWifiIndoorPositioningNotAvailable()
        Description copied from interface: StatusListener
        Indoor WiFi positioning is not available. This callback is called when Android platform version is Android 9.0 (Pie) or newer. In Android 9.0 Google added WiFi scan throttling to platform which limits WiFi scans to four scans per two minutes for foreground applications. For background application this limitation is even more severe 30 minutes for all background applications.
        Specified by:
        onWifiIndoorPositioningNotAvailable in interface StatusListener

      • onWifiIndoorPositioningDegraded

        public void onWifiIndoorPositioningDegraded()
        Description copied from interface: StatusListener
        Indoor WiFi positioning update rate is degraded. This callback is called when Android platform version is Android 9.0 (Pie) or newer. In Android 9.0 Google added WiFi scan throttling to platform which limits WiFi scans to four scans per two minutes for foreground applications. For background application this limitation is even more severe 30 minutes for all background applications.
        Specified by:
        onWifiIndoorPositioningDegraded in interface StatusListener
